feed.title: Donetick Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Donetick: v0.0.20
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 0bd7c08a8b5a74d99e983d1e72564c3e495c3650 Require ID, LabelID, User ID for adding label Add Validation priorty update Update priorty only update priorty Add Support to get tasks via API endpoint
  • ed4144a64b832ee68c3727d44eb3c8a67c1cdbed - Fix failure when trying to save empty labels
  • Update Label Manager Component
  • Add more filters

What's Changed

  • Logic For Building Image on Additional Architectures by @nerethos in https://github.com/donetick/donetick/pull/11
  • Improve UI for Label management screen @majicmaj in https://github.com/donetick/frontend/pull/3

New Contributors

  • @nerethos made their first contribution in https://github.com/donetick/donetick/pull/11
  • @majicmaj made their first contribution in https://github.com/donetick/frontend/pull/3

Full Changelog: https://github.com/donetick/donetick/compare/v0.0.18...v0.0.20

entry.title: New release for Donetick: v0.0.21
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 95a9e4af5bc5906d15ffe574b495db4cbd2a5c06 Skip sending Telegram message if bot is not initialized
  • Fix Labels on task not working with other user in circle https://github.com/donetick/donetick/issues/38

entry.title: New release for Donetick: v0.0.22
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/donetick/donetick/compare/v0.0.20...v0.0.22 - Support Disable Signup via DONETICK_DISABLE_SIGNUP env variable - Support Pushover for notification - Add the ability to show API Token - Improve the UI, separating tasks by dates and ability to group by date

Fix : - https://github.com/donetick/donetick/issues/27 - https://github.com/donetick/donetick/issues/39

entry.title: New release for Donetick: v0.0.23
entry.content:
Changelog

  • Support Loading Archived Tasks
  • Remove Completed Task from the main view

Fix :

  • https://github.com/donetick/donetick/issues/49

Full Changelog: https://github.com/donetick/donetick/compare/v0.0.22...v0.0.23

entry.title: New release for Donetick: v0.0.24
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 52af6652d8bd59067fc99a4e21fa2508f8f950bd Update Readme Support Archive and unarchive Fix bug with the scheduler #53
  • Support Archiving and Unarchiving task
  • Support Arranging Tasks but in different ways: by Due Date, Priority, Labels

First Android App Release ðŸŽ‰

a pre-release/ Alpha release for Donetick Android app!

Features

  • Local Notifications: Stay updated with tasks and chores using notifications directly on your device.
  • Self-Hosted Support! connect to your self-hosted Donetick instance.
  • For Self-Hosters:
  • After downloading and installing the app:
  • Navigate to the login screen.
  • Tap the settings icon in the top-right corner.
  • Enter your self-hosted URL to connect your instance.

DISCLAIMER: This is an early release/pre-release. if you run into an issue. please report them in this repo https://github.com/donetick/frontend
